short_summary: Furniture purchase and installation for Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada
description: Some long text about a Procurement procedure.
full_summary:
### Call for Tender and Supply Arrangement (SA) Procurement for Office Furniture
<!-- Order: country-specific info first, then descend on globalodesk entities which have similar standard-centric approach -->

**[Title]**
Furniture for Workspaces Supply Arrangement (SA)
English: Arrangement en matière d’approvisionnement (AMA) pour mobilier de postes de travail
French: Arrangement en matière d’approvisionnement (AMA) pour mobilier de postes de travail

**[Reference and Contract Information]**
* Reference Number:  cb-782-53910003
* Solicitation Number: 30005024
* Amendment Number: 5 of 1 (original contract)
* Procurement Status: Expired
* Solicitation Status: Expiré (Outgoing contract status in French)

**[General Information]**
* Procurement Category: Goods (Category GD)
* Tender Type: Request for Proposal (RFP) as part of Supply Arrangement (SA) Procurement
* Procurement Method: Competitive Selective Tendering
* Notice Type: English: RFP against Supply Arrangement; French: Demande de proposition découlant d’un arrangement en matière d’approvisionnement

**[Description]**
This tender seeks a contractor to supply, deliver, and install office furniture at a Government entity in Mont-Joli, Québec, Canada.

The tender specifically refers to the following categories within PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA):

- **Product Category 1(b): Interconnecting Panels and Freestanding Systems**
- **Product Category 2: Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets**
- **Product Category 3: Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets including related freestanding systems**

**[Labour and Materials]**
The tender encompasses the supply of furniture, delivery, and installation at a procurement-release site in Mont-Joli, Quebec, as well as all necessary packaging, labeling, protecting, preparing for transportation and delivery (including transfer costs).

**[Trade Agreements]**
This tender is issued according to the following commercial agreements:

- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**[Regions of Operation]**
All the usual warnings to follow Canadian Trade Certifications and exportation rules when being brought in from another province i re Quest ends countries.

**[Regions of Delivery]**
* Quebec (only regions except from NCR [National Capital Region] METHODS never recommended until shipped, however)
